channel.title: CVE Feed for Step Tools -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Step Tools -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-0973|2024-08-02T05:32:46.021Z -- step%20tools -- v18sp1%20ifcmesh%20library
item.description: STEPTools v18SP1 ifcmesh library (v18.1) is affected due to a null pointer dereference, which could allow an attacker to deny application usage when reading a specially constructed file, resulting in an application crash.
